function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unrestricted air travel contributing to the spread of pandemics, such as viral influenza types like COVID-19.","Impact":"Severe impact on the aviation sector and wider economy, reduced passenger volumes, and potential long-term financial struggles for airlines.","Mitigation":"Implement restrictions on air travel, enhanced screening and testing at entry points, and investment in technology for air quality control in transportation hubs.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, biometric screening, and contactless technology for check-in and boarding.","People":"Passengers, airline employees, airport staff, travelers, and the wider population at risk of pandemic spread.","Owner":"Government authorities, aviation industry stakeholders, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Environmental pollution and transportation/industrialization contributing to critical issues highlighted by the pandemic.","Impact":"Exacerbation of environmental pollution, increased risk of public health crises, and long-term sustainability challenges.","Mitigation":"Transition to sustainable transportation and industrial practices, investment in green technologies, and regulatory measures to reduce pollution and emissions.","Technologies":"Electric vehicles, renewable energy sources, carbon capture and storage technologies, and smart city infrastructure.","People":"Communities living near industrial zones, workers in transportation and industry, and the general public at risk of environmental health impacts.","Owner":"Government bodies, industry leaders, and environmental advocacy groups."},{"Description":"Non-resilience of peer-to-peer (P2P) or sharing economy models to global systemic shocks.","Impact":"Disruption of employment and service provision, financial instability for service providers, and broader economic uncertainty.","Mitigation":"Diversification of income sources, creation of safety nets for gig workers, and development of contingency plans for economic downturns.","Technologies":"Online platforms for remote work, digital payment systems, and data-driven risk assessment tools for economic planning.","People":"Gig workers, service providers, and individuals relying on sharing economy platforms for income.","Owner":"Platform operators, government agencies, and labor organizations."}]}
